name: Cape Design for Minecraft PC
description:
Quick create a cape now! Minecraft Cape Design is the best designed Minecraft cape creation tools! The most advanced & easy to use interface allows you quick create, edit, eMail and share your cape with others and enjoy it! More than 50,000 of Best Capes template to choose! Unique in app Store!

* Thousands of best selected capes template to use.
* Full featured and most powerful cape editor.
* Undo and ReDo to modify your changes.
* A lot of image filter to apply to your capes.
* Recent used colors are saved for easy access.
* Load a skin from a URL to modify.
* Quick share your cape.
* Easy manager your favorite capes.

Live New Capes - Hundreds of new capes added everyday for Free!


Disclaim:
This app can not provide a cape to your character in the game.
This app is not an official Minecraft Product, not approved by or associated with Mojang.

Disclaim:
The files generated by this app may only function with modified versions of Minecraft on the PC.
